name: Cast when Stunned Support
description:
Cast when Stunned Support
Support, Spell, TriggerLevel: (1–20)Cooldown Time: 0.10 secRequires Level (38–70), (27–48) Dex, (39–70) IntEach supported spell skill will have a chance to be triggered when you are stunned. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.(50–69)% chance to Trigger Supported Spells when you are Stunned, orBlock a Stunning Hit
Additional Effects From Quality:(0–20)% chance to Trigger Supported Spells when you are Stunned, orBlock a Stunning Hit
This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
Cast when Stunned Support
Cast when Stunned Support
Cast when Stunned Support is a Support gem that causes a linked Spell to trigger when the player is stunned or blocks a stunning hit.
Cast when Stunned targets the enemy which stunned the player. Spells that don't have targeting, like Discharge or Ice Nova, will be cast on the character as usual.
Cast when Stunned has several advantages, which may tip its balance in its favour, depending on your character's build:

Cast when Stunned Support is a Support gem that causes a linked Spell to trigger when the player is stunned or blocks a stunning hit.
Cast when Stunned targets the enemy which stunned the player. Spells that don't have targeting, like Discharge or Ice Nova, will be cast on the character as usual.
Cast when Stunned has several advantages, which may tip its balance in its favour, depending on your character's build:
gemDescription: Each supported spell skill will have a chance to be triggered when you are stunned. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
